snippet: The director of “Newsies” told BroadwayWorld.com that “it’ll be fun to be with Jeremy again,” which was apparently an inadvertent slip on his part.
abstract: The director of “Newsies” told BroadwayWorld.com that “it’ll be fun to be with Jeremy again,” which was apparently an inadvertent slip on his part.

headline.main: Jeremy Jordan On Verge of Joining Broadway Move of Disney's 'Newsies'
headline.print_headline: ‘Newsies’ on Broadway May Have Its Star
